author: A_Brickset_user
title: Cute Xmas Stocking stuffer
review:
Have 2 girls of my own (one son too--got him elf boy) 
ages 14 + 11.  They both liked the toy.  Limited play--we will use mostly for holiday decor--along with all our Holiday Theme little Lego sets....includes tree, snowman, angel, santa claus, and reindeer, if I remember correctly.
